findings.title: MasterChef has owner privileges and can mint tokens
findings.description: MasterChef has the ability to mint tokens as long as MAXCAP is smaller than MAXCAPSUPPLY

findings.title: Minting Restriction Based on MAXCAP and MAXCAPSUPPLY
findings.description: The mint function has a restriction where it can only mint as long as MAXCAP is smaller than MAXCAPSUPPLY, ensuring that the maximum token supply is not exceeded.
